data.eml:eml: New species of leaf-mining Nepticulidae (Lepidoptera) from the Neotropical and Ando-Patagonian regions, with new data on host plants

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stonis, Jonas R., Remeikis, Andrius, Diškus, Arūnas, Megoran, Nick (2017): New species of leaf-mining Nepticulidae (Lepidoptera) from the Neotropical and Ando-Patagonian regions, with new data on host plants. Zootaxa 4272 (1): 1-39, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4272.1.1
